title: We Donâ€™t Talk Anymore (feat. Selena Gomez)
author: Charlie Puth
lyrics:
[00:00.17] We don't talk anymore
[00:02.78] We don't talk anymore
[00:05.01] We don't talk anymore
[00:06.87] Like we used to do
[00:10.00] We don't love anymore
[00:12.35] What was all of it for?
[00:14.44] Oh, we don't talk anymore
[00:16.35] Like we used to do
[00:19.57] I just heard you found the one you've been looking
[00:22.87] You've been looking for
[00:25.44] I wish I would have known that wasn't me
[00:29.17] 'Cause even after all this time I still wonder
[00:32.57] Why I can't move on
[00:35.18] Just the way you did so easily?
[00:39.03] Don't wanna know
[00:40.93] What kind of dress you're wearing tonight
[00:43.28] If he's holding onto you so tight
[00:45.76] The way I did before
[00:48.62] I overdosed
[00:50.58] Should've known your love was a game
[00:52.82] Now I can't get you out of my brain
[00:55.36] Oh, it's such a shame
[00:58.00] That we don't talk anymore

[01:14.03] Like we used to do

[01:26.73] Every now and then I think you
[01:29.24] Might want me to come show up at your door
[01:32.53] But I'm just too afraid that I'll be wrong
[01:36.59] Don't wanna know
[01:38.49] If you're looking into her eyes
[01:41.09] If she's holding onto you so tight
[01:43.47] The way I did before
[01:46.16] I overdosed
[01:48.23] Should've known your love was a game
[01:50.44] Now I can't get you out of my brain
[01:52.94] Ooh, it's such a shame
[01:55.62] That we don't talk anymore (we don't, we don't)
[01:58.27] We don't talk anymore (we don't, we don't)
